DescriptionData.Title: Snazaroo Theme Packs - Blue Space Cat (3 Colors)
DescriptionData.Description: Snazaroo Blue Space Cat Face Painting Kit includes three Snazaroo face paint colors and step by step instructions to paint cool avatar face painting designs. Snazaroo paints apply smoothly, can be easily blended and will dry in about 30 seconds to a streak-free, durable finish. Snazaroo face paints are hypoallergenic and the world's safest face paints, meeting US FDA, Canadian, and European standards for cosmetic safety and the only face paint with a Child Toy Safety Rating. Each Snazaroo Blue Cat Face Painting Kit includes three 2 ml Snazaroo paints in white, pale blue and royal blue. (Applicator and sponges not included.)
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 3 color Snazaroo Blue Cat Face Painting Kit will easily paint 10 to 15 full face paint designs
Each Snazaroo Blue Cat Face Painting Kit includes three 2 ml Snazaroo paints in white, pale blue and royal blue.
One of the most popular face paints in the world
